pull.title: refactor: Remove SER_GETHASH, hard-code client version in CKeyPool serialize
pull.body:
Removes a bunch of redundant, dead or duplicate code.

Uses the idea from and finishes the idea https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28428 by theuni

verification.payload:
tree 027945491283d0c943ca2f704c8f499253311a32
parent f01416e23c9c820517c37003a2a98dd46d1022ba
author MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1694444302 +0000
committer MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1695133197 +0000

Remove unused GetType() from OverrideStream, CVectorWriter, SpanReader

GetType() is never called, so it is completely unused and can be
removed.

events.message:
Remove unused GetType() from OverrideStream, CVectorWriter, SpanReader

GetType() is never called, so it is completely unused and can be
removed.

verification.payload:
tree d45356514481c7a21d7fe4c87681a85bfdd86347
parent fa4a9c0f4334678fb80358ead667807bf2a0a153
author MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1694440072 +0200
committer MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1695134288 +0200

Remove CHashWriter type

The type is only ever set, but never read via GetType(), so remove it.
Also, remove SerializeHash to avoid silent merge conflicts and use the
already existing GetHash() boilerplate consistently.

events.message:
Remove CHashWriter type

The type is only ever set, but never read via GetType(), so remove it.
Also, remove SerializeHash to avoid silent merge conflicts and use the
already existing GetHash() boilerplate consistently.

Remove SER_GETHASH, hard-code client version in CKeyPool serialize

It was never set, so it can be removed along with any code reading it.

comments.body: `CHashWriter{0}` is pretty ugly. I assume this will be going away though as part of one of the other refactors going on?
